attributes.action: Reject the Brexit withdrawal document as unacceptable to the British public .
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May is on record as statting "it is my way or no way". This is the language of a dictator not a democratically elected Prime Minister.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has negotiated an agreement which is a capitulation of British Sovereignty and is unacceptable to the British people who voted to leave the EU
